name: Base Dolphin
description:
**PLEASE USE HEADSETS (HEADPHONES OR EARPHONES) OR SOUND SYSTEM WITH GOOD STEREO IF AVAILABLE**

Note for the game jam judges: The sound manager script for this game was used from my previous projects.

Game by: NsiX#8491 ( Discord )

Controls : 

Mouse: Aim
Left - Click: Shoot Missle
Arrow Keys: UI Navigation
Escape: Pause and UI navigation

Instructions: Hear the detection notification sound after the radar pulse, and accordingly move the mouse horizontally to aim and press left click to shoot missiles towards submarines. The later the notification sound is played after the radar pulse, the farther away the submarine is. If three submarines pass without being killed, the game ends. Total submarines destroyed will be the points you score. While in-game press escape to pause it. Please use Headsets or a sound system with good stereo for a better experience. Thank you.

Credits: UI Accesible Plugin by MetalPop Games : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/ui-accessibility-plugin-uap-8793... Text to speech for in-game radio voice: https://voicemaker.in/

Notes:

Let me know your feedback on this in the comments or private message me on discord to contact me. Thank you for playing (:
